articles.title: NVIDIA Confirms Updated DLSS Frame Generation On RTX 40 GPUs, Leads to Lower VRAM Usage & Faster Performance - Wccftech
articles.description: NVIDIA has confirmed that the new AI model is deployed for improving Frame Generation on the RTX 40 series GPUs as well.
articles.content:
The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 GPUs are also getting a better AI model for superior DLSS frame generation and lower VRAM requirements.
